item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行上半年现金收益增长 1
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的商业银行澳大利亚国民银行（National Australia Bank）周三表示，受贷款量增长和减值费用降低的影响，上半年现金收益增长了 1%。【原文：National Australia Bank , the country's biggest business lender, said on Wednesday its first-half cash earnings rose 1%, helped by growth in lending volumes and lower impairment charges.】

item.title: 针对以色列国家安全局的 Meta 诉讼案让人们对网络间谍世界有了难得的了解
item.description: 以色列 NSO 集团周二被加利福尼亚州的一个联邦陪审团判处 1.68 亿美元的罚款，原因是该公司劫持了 WhatsApp 的服务器，代表外国间谍机构入侵 Meta 旗下聊天平台的用户。此案结束了美国社交媒体巨头与监控公司之间长达六年的斗争。它也让人们对间谍软件行业的内部运作有了不同寻常的了解。【原文：Israel's NSO Group was handed a $168 million penalty by a federal jury in California on Tuesday for hijacking the servers of WhatsApp in order to hack users of the Meta-owned chat platform on behalf of foreign spy agencies. The case caps a six-year battle between the American social media giant and the surveillance firm. It has also cast a unusual amount of light on the inner workings of the spyware industry.】

item.title: 永利度假村公布的季度业绩不佳，原因是旗下各产业发展放缓
item.description: 永利度假村周二公布的第一季度业绩不及华尔街预期，原因是其豪华度假村业务不振。【原文：Wynn Resorts posted first-quarter results that missed Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, owing to sluggish business across its luxury resorts.】

item.title: Meta 与 NSO 之间的法庭冲突以间谍软件公司败诉 1.68 亿美元告终
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司周二表示，该公司赢得了对以色列监控公司 NSO 1.68 亿美元的裁决，为美国最大的社交网络平台与世界上最知名的间谍软件公司之间长达六年的掰手腕比赛画上了句号。【原文：Meta Platforms won a $168 million verdict against the Israeli surveillance firm NSO, the company said Tuesday, capping a six-year arm wrestling match between America's biggest social networking platform and the world's best known spyware company.】

item.title: 达美航空必须面对乘客对大规模电脑故障的诉讼
item.description: 联邦法官周二裁定，达美航空公司必须面对乘客提出的集体诉讼，这些乘客称，在去年 7 月发生大规模计算机故障后，达美航空公司在延误或取消航班后拒绝提供全额退款。【原文：Delta Air Lines must face a proposed class action by passengers who said it refused to offer full refunds after delaying or canceling their flights following a massive computer outage last July, a federal judge ruled on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国希望航空公司削减纽瓦克机场的航班，以缓解目前的困境
item.description: 美国运输部部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周二表示，自 4 月 28 日以来，新泽西纽瓦克国际机场已有数百个航班中断，美国运输部正与航空公司合作削减该机场的航班，并增加空中交通人员。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department is working with airlines to cut flights at New Jersey's Newark International Airport and boost air traffic staffing after hundreds of flights have been disrupted since April 28, Secretary Sean Duffy said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔认为五月份对决定巴西新投资至关重要
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔在巴西的负责人周二告诉路透社，随着当前投资周期的临近结束，5 月份对于钢铁制造商安赛乐米塔尔决定是否继续在巴西进行新的投资至关重要。【原文：The month of May will be crucial for steelmaker ArcelorMittal to decide whether it will move forward with fresh investments in Brazil, its head in the country told Reuters on Tuesday, as it approaches the end of its current investment cycle.】

item.title: 金融科技需求强劲，杰克-亨利第三季度利润上升
item.description: 本周二，杰克-亨利联合公司（Jack Henry & Associates）公布的第三季度利润增长了约 28%，这主要得益于市场对这家金融技术公司产品和服务的强劲需求。【原文：Jack Henry & Associates posted about a 28% rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by strong demand for the financial technology company's products and services.】

item.title: TPG 和 Corpay 拟以 22 亿美元收购 AvidXchange
item.description: 全球另类资产管理公司 TPG 周二表示，将与 Corpay 合作，以 22 亿美元的全现金交易收购支付解决方案公司 AvidXchange。【原文：Global alternative asset manager TPG will partner Corpay to buy payments solution firm AvidXchange for $2.2 billion in an all-cash deal, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Meta 公司被判赔偿间谍软件公司 NSO 集团 1.68 亿美元
item.description: 社交媒体巨头 Meta Platforms 周二表示，它已从以色列间谍软件公司 NSO 集团获得 1.68 亿美元的赔偿，因为该监控公司被认定对入侵其系统负有责任。【原文：Social media giant Meta Platforms said on Tuesday it has been awarded $168 million in damages from the Israeli spyware firm NSO group after the surveillance company was found liable for hacking its systems.】

item.title: 三星电子称旗下哈曼公司以 3.5 亿美元收购 Masimo 音频业务
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics）周三表示，该公司旗下的哈曼国际公司（Harman International）签署了一项协议，将以 3.5 亿美元的价格收购美国 Masimo 公司的音频业务。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Wednesday its unit Harman International signed a deal to acquire U.S. firm Masimo's audio business for $350 million.】

item.title: 交易日：关税不明，神经紧绷
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国证券交易委员会新任主席称 15%的员工已离职，合同将被削减
item.description: 据熟悉内情的消息人士透露，美国证券交易委员会新任负责人周二告诉员工，该机构各办公室和部门的员工人数已经减少了 15%，他预计将进行 "有针对性的 "重组。【原文：The new head of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission told staff on Tuesday the agency has lost 15% of its headcount across offices and divisions and he expects to conduct a "targeted" reorganization, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由于需求强劲，Avast 杀毒软件所有者 Gen Digital 预测 2026 年前景乐观
item.description: 提供 Avast、Avira 和 Norton 等杀毒软件的 Gen Digital 公司周二预测的年度收入和利润将高于分析师的预期，这表明市场对其网络安全工具的需求强劲，使其股价在收盘后上涨了约 4%。【原文：Gen Digital , which offers antivirus software such as Avast, Avira and Norton, forecast annual revenue and profit above analysts' estimate on Tuesday, signaling strong demand for its cybersecurity tools, sending its shares up about 4% after the bell.】

item.title: 米尔肯公司的阿克曼说哈佛大学 "无权 "获得联邦基金
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）周二表示，哈佛大学是美国历史最悠久、最富有的大学之一，当学校把钱浪费在他所谓的 "行政臃肿 "上时，就不应该享受纳税人的资金。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman on Tuesday said Harvard University, one of the nation's oldest and wealthiest, should not be entitled to taxpayer funds when the school wastes money on what he calls "administrative bloat."】

item.title: 激进投资者 Glenview Capital 减持 CVS Health 股份
item.description: 激进投资者 Glenview Capital 周二表示，在 CVS Health 公布 "健康 "的第一季度业绩并上调年度预期后，该公司减持了 375 万股股票。【原文：Activist investor Glenview Capital said on Tuesday it reduced its holdings in CVS Health by 3.75 million shares after the insurer posted "healthy" first-quarter results and raised annual forecast.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Marvell 以宏观经济不确定性为由推迟投资者日活动；收窄营收预期
item.description: 网络和定制人工智能芯片制造商美满电子科技（Marvell Technology）周二表示，由于全球贸易紧张局势引发经济不确定性，公司将推迟原定的投资者日会议，理由是 "宏观经济环境充满活力"。【原文：Networking and custom AI chipmaker Marvell Technology said on Tuesday it is postponing a previously scheduled investor day conference, citing a "dynamic macroeconomic environment," as global trade tensions generate economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 科蒂下调年度利润预期
item.description: CoverGirl 母公司科蒂公司周二下调了年度利润预期，表明在通胀压力下美国化妆品需求疲软。【原文：CoverGirl parent Coty cut its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, signaling soft demand for cosmetics in the United States amid inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 AMD 预测第二季度营收高于预期
item.description: AMD 周二预测第二季度营收将高于华尔街预期，即使贸易紧张局势给全球经济前景蒙上阴影，该公司仍将人工智能芯片的强劲需求作为赌注。【原文：AMD forecast second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on robust demand for its artificial-intelligence chips even as trade tensions cloud the global economic outlook.】

item.title: EA 预计新游戏 "战地 "的年度预订额将超过预期
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）周二预测，2026 财年的账面收入将高于华尔街预期，这家电子游戏发行商看好其体育游戏的强劲表现和新游戏《战地》（Battlefield）的推出。【原文：Electronic Arts forecast fiscal 2026 bookings above Wall Street expectations on Tuesday, as the videogame publisher bets on the strong performance of its sports titles and the launch of a new "Battlefield" game.】

item.title: 超微公司下调年度收入预期，股价下跌
item.description: 超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer）周二下调了 2025 财年的营收预期，这加剧了人们对这家服务器制造商在人工智能市场地位的担忧，此前一系列内部问题曾导致该公司可能退市。【原文：Super Micro Computer trimmed its fiscal 2025 revenue expectation on Tuesday, adding to concerns around the server maker's position in the AI market after a litany of internal issues had brought on a potential delisting】

item.title: 油价下跌导致德文郡能源公司第一季度利润不及预期
item.description: 受油价下跌影响，德文能源公司周二未能实现第一季度利润预期。【原文：Devon Energy missed first-quarter profit estimates on Tuesday, hit by lower oil prices.】

item.title: 美国关税影响需求，Rivian 下调年度交付量预期
item.description: 由于美国对进口汽车和汽车零部件征收关税可能会扰乱经济，并损害对其电动 SUV 和皮卡的需求，Rivian 公司周二下调了 2025 年的交付预期。【原文：Rivian lowered its deliveries forecast for 2025 on Tuesday as U.S. tariffs on imported vehicles and auto parts threaten to unsettle the economy and hurt demand for its electric SUVs and pickup trucks.】

item.title: 即使关税问题对汽车制造商造成冲击，Lucid 仍坚持年产量预期
item.description: 尽管关税威胁迫使许多汽车制造商撤回目标，但Lucid周二仍坚持其2025年的产量预测，同时这家豪华电动汽车制造商公布的第一季度营收低于分析师预期。【原文：Lucid stuck to its 2025 production forecast on Tuesday despite the threat of tariffs forcing many automakers to pull back targets, while the luxury electric-vehicle maker reported first-quarter revenue below analysts' expectations.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局任命该机构批评家维奈-普拉萨德（Vinay Prasad）为最高疫苗官员
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局周二表示，该局已任命曾批评过 FDA 领导层和 COVID-19 授权的肿瘤学家 Vinay Prasad 担任生物制品评估与研究中心主任。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has named Vinay Prasad, an oncologist who has previously criticized FDA leadership and COVID-19 mandates, as the director of its Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research, the agency said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国受压企业四月份债务重组增多
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）周二的数据显示，由于企业面临关税上涨、通货膨胀和资本市场波动的压力，4月份财务状况紧张的美国企业进行的债务重组增加了近60%。【原文：Debt restructuring by financially stressed U.S. companies rose nearly 60% in April, data from JPMorgan showed on Tuesday, as businesses faced pressure from rising tariffs, inflation and capital markets volatility.】

item.title: 制药商寻求规避关税，3月份美国进口药品激增
item.description: 由于制药商在美国可能对其产品征收关税前备货，3 月份对美国的药品进口激增。【原文：Pharmaceutical imports to the U.S. surged in March as drugmakers stocked up ahead of potential U.S. tariffs on their products, which have historically been exempt from such fees.】

item.title: 关税影响外出就餐欲望，巴菲特的 Dairy Queen 保持警惕
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的 Dairy Queen 首席执行官表示，有迹象表明消费者减少了外出就餐的次数，但相信美国的特许经营商能够承受经济压力，包括关税带来的压力。【原文：Dairy Queen, owned by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway , has seen signs that consumers are dining out less, but believes American franchisees can withstand economic pressures, including from tariffs, its chief executive said.】

item.title: 贝莱德称，尽管基调乐观，但美国部分信贷市场仍闪现警告信号
item.description: 贝莱德集团（BlackRock）的一位高管表示，尽管市场普遍希望关税带来的动荡已经平息，但美国企业债务市场的一些地区正在闪现出警告信号，即经济降温正在挤压最脆弱的借款人。【原文：Pockets of the U.S. corporate debt market are flashing warning signs that a cooling economy is squeezing the most fragile borrowers, a BlackRock executive said, despite broader market hopes that the turbulence from tariffs has subsided.】

item.title: EIA 称欧佩克+产量增加、关税不确定性加剧油价波动
item.description: 美国能源信息署（U.S. Energy Information Administration）周二表示，石油市场参与者对欧佩克+产量增加导致供过于求的看法，以及关税对经济影响的不确定性，加剧了短期油价波动。【原文：Perceptions of oversupply among oil market participants from increasing OPEC+ output and uncertainty about the economic impact of tariffs have raised short-term oil price volatility, the U.S. Energy Information Administration said on Tuesday.】
